data.name: Restoration Builders of Texas
data.address: 701 E Plano Pkwy Suite 305, Plano, TX 75074

reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Great people, great service, great price." "Lack of professionalism, and wasting the customer's time, OMG!" "They assessed the issues quickly and got right to work."

Ross and his team helped tarp from Skylights from the recent hailstorm. I was busy so I had him file a claim for me. I’m thankful for good people like him. They will be all over the Euless/Bedford area to help anyone and everyone and I highly recommend you give him a call! More Response from the owner 4 years ago
Hi Wes, thank you for your review! We are thrilled to hear about your 5-star experience. Our goal is to provide next level service to you during each project. We appreciate you recommending us!

Experienced hails storm last night. George is the fifth company that ring my doorbell to offer roof inspections. Three companies “representatives “ dressed in street clothes, I don’t even know which company they are representing.
